SEARCH
Package entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object
The Entity class represents a generic entity in the game. It defines common attributes and behaviors for all game entities.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(float x, float y, int width, int height)
      Constructs an Entity instance with the specified position and dimensions.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the entity's position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the entity's position.
      width - The width of the entity.
      height - The height of the entity.

  • Method Details

    • drawAttackBox

      protected void drawAttackBox(Graphics g, int xLvlOffset)
      Draws the entity's attack box for debugging purposes.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      xLvlOffset - The x-axis level offset for drawing.

    • drawHitbox

      protected void drawHitbox(Graphics g, int xLvlOffset)
      Draws the entity's hitbox for debugging purposes.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      xLvlOffset - The x-axis level offset for drawing.

    • initHitbox

      protected void initHitbox(int width, int height)
      Initializes the hitbox for the entity.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the hitbox.
      height - The height of the hitbox.
